## Summary
- Today's flight (PI Anna):
  - Deep convection and associated doldrums expected in Eastern circle
  - Lower chance of deep convection on Earthcare track

- Thursday's flight (PI Jakob):
  - Circles appear to be well placed at the moist margins
  - Deep convection expected in northwestern flight area

- Saturday's flight (PI Julia):
  - No ICWV>48mm and no deep convection around Earthcare track
  - Chance to sample pronounced "dry-air" doldrums
